title: C:.........\Leauge of Legends\4.1.12\install\disk1.cab
body: Hi I went looking to see if anyone else had this problem. I found only a few posts and no solutions, or replys really. I was hoping someone can help me out with this. I recently restored my computer to factory settings and tried to download league of legends. But this issue came up. Some path issue or some way I cant download a certain file. Any help would be appreciated thanks!

replies.body:
I've rarely seen this issue, but almost every time, it's been on a PC running Windows XP or Vista. Installing League with [this alternative installer](https://riotgamespatcher-a.akamaihd.net/ShellInstaller/NA/LeagueofLegends_NA_Installer_9_15_2014.exe) should bypass the issue.

Let me know if that's not the case.

Yeah great that worked! But I'm getting this RADS issue. I remember getting this years ago but I just ran it as an admin and that fixed the problem then. Now no such luck. I've tried some forums but nothing helped. I also have windows 8.

Can you update to Windows 8.1? There are a number of issues that pop up in Windows 8, due to missing crucial windows assets. You can find instructions on how to do this [here.](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/15356/windows-8-install-update-kb-2919355)
